sentences.en: A quick nod of approval would have done nicely.
sentences.cn: 要是当时立即点头同意就好了。

sentences.en: After the birth, mother and child are doing nicely.
sentences.cn: 产后, 母亲和孩子都很平安.

sentences.en: He treated you very nicely and acted like a decent guy.
sentences.cn: 他对你非常有礼貌，举止得体。

sentences.en: He's just written a book, nicely illustrated and not too technical.
sentences.cn: 他刚写完一本书，插图精美，内容也并不艰涩。

sentences.en: I think this puts the problem very nicely.
sentences.cn: 我认为这点很好地说明了那个问题。

sentences.en: My life is going along nicely.
She felt she would blend in nicely.
sentences.cn: 她觉得自己可以很好地融入进来。

sentences.en: She has a bit of private money, so they manage quite nicely.
sentences.cn: 她有一点私房钱，所以他们过得很舒心。

sentences.en: The colours in that picture contrast nicely.
sentences.cn: 颜色在这幅图画里很协调.

sentences.en: The crowds had been soaked and were now nicely drying out.
sentences.cn: 这群人都浑身湿透，现在谢天谢地快晾干了。

sentences.en: The new students seem to be shaping up quite nicely.
sentences.cn: 新生们看来表现得相当不错.

sentences.en: This toilet soap lathers so nicely and has several fragrances.
sentences.cn: 这种香皂起泡很多,并且有好几种香味.

words.tran_cn: 精密的；美好的；细微的；和蔼的

trans.tran_cn: 漂亮地，恰当地，规规矩矩地，精密地，非常讲究地
